fees.description: A $118.16 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A $118.16 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A 0.27% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA debit card.
A fee of $15.00 (GST exempt) may apply if your bill is not paid by the due date.
A 0.65% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA credit card.
A 0.33% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard debit card.
A 0.67% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard credit card.
If you pay at an Australia Post outlet, a payment processing fee of the higher of $2.70 or 0.49% (incl GST) may apply.
A 0.64% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by American Express credit card.

electricityContract.terms: When the Energy Plan ends, you'll receive our standard retailer feed-in tariff published on our website. Not available all areas or property types. Small Business customers only. See originenergy.com.au/2889/Terms-and-conditions for more
electricityContract.variation: We may vary the Charges (including their amount, nature and structure) by notice to you at any time. The notice will be at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of the variation.

eligibility.description: Your solar PV system must be net metered and must not be receiving a government funded feed-in tariff.

demandCharges.description: Capacity charges are applied to the maximum half hourly kW power reading that occurred at a customer's connection point over the 12 months prior to a bill being calculated. The kW reading can only occur in peak times which are from 2pm to 8pm on working weekdays.
demandCharges.displayName: Capacity charge (cents per kW per day)

greenPowerCharges.description: For 1.13 cents/kWh 25% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources
For 2.25 cents/kWh 50% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources
For 4.50 cents/kWh 100% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources

solarFeedInTariff.description: Origin offers 8 cents per KWh until a daily export limit of 8 KWh is reached. The daily export limit is averaged across your billing period (calculated by multiplying the number of days in your billing period by your daily export limit of 8 KWh)
For any amount above the daily export, you will receive our standard retailer feed-in tariff of 3 cents per KWh

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: At the end of the benefit period we may extend your current Energy Plan or set you up with a new Energy Plan but only if we have written to you first and you havent told us not to
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: You must pay us any charges your distributor imposes on us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional charges that may apply see www.originenergy.com.au/1612/Additional-charges
